channel.title: NPR Topics: Culture
channel.description: Art and entertainment commentary plus interviews, book reviews, movie reviews, music reviews, comedy, and visual art. Subscribe to podcasts and follow trends in music, painting, art, architecture, photography, and design.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: In reversal, Warner Bros. jilts Netflix for Paramount
item.description: Warner Bros. says Paramount's sweetened bid to buy the whole company is "superior" to an $83 billion deal it struck with Netflix for just its streaming services, studios, and intellectual property.
item.content:encoded:
Warner Bros. says Paramount's sweetened bid to buy the whole company is "superior" to an $83 billion deal it struck with Netflix for just its streaming services, studios, and intellectual property.

(Image credit: Bloomberg/Bloomberg via Getty Images)
item.dc:creator: David Folkenflik

item.title: Iraqi film draws on Saddam-era childhood in tale of life under dictatorship
item.description: Hasan Hadi's debut feature film is a neorealist look at how life under Saddam Hussein and sanctions in 1990s Iraq destroyed children's innocence.
item.content:encoded:
The President's Cake, in the role of nine-year-old Lamia, who is tasked with baking a birthday cake for Iraqi dictator Saddam Hussein.'/>

Hasan Hadi's debut feature film is a neorealist look at how life under Saddam Hussein and sanctions in 1990s Iraq destroyed children's innocence.
item.dc:creator: Leila Fadel

item.title: Every month in Baker, Nev., people come out for a full moon hike
item.description: Among the cattle ranches and stretches of desert of Eastern Nevada, there aren't a lot of social events. But there is a full moon hike every month in the tiny town of Baker.
item.content:encoded: Among the cattle ranches and stretches of desert of Eastern Nevada, there aren't a lot of social events. But there is a full moon hike every month in the tiny town of Baker.
item.dc:creator: Fil Corbitt

item.title: Her unsung hero stepped in when her dad couldn't be there
item.description: Olivia Joffrey's teacher organized a Father's Day softball game for students and their dads. But Joffrey's father was sick and not able to be there for his daughter. Her unsung hero stepped in.
item.content:encoded: Olivia Joffrey's teacher organized a Father's Day softball game for students and their dads. But Joffrey's father was sick and not able to be there for his daughter. Her unsung hero stepped in.

item.title: This novel about family drama is so good you may want to re-read it immediately
item.description: Allegra Goodman's new novel is called This Is Not About Us, but critic Maureen Corrigan says that title is coy: Readers are bound to see aspects of themselves and their families in these pages.
item.content:encoded: Allegra Goodman's new novel is called This Is Not About Us, but critic Maureen Corrigan says that title is coy: Readers are bound to see aspects of themselves and their families in these pages.
item.dc:creator: Maureen Corrigan

item.title: Actor Stellan Skarsgård doesn't believe in bad guys
item.description: Skarsgård plays a filmmaker struggling to connect with his two grown daughters in Sentimental Value. As the father of eight, the Swedish actor says he understands the tension his character faces.
item.content:encoded:
Skarsgård plays a filmmaker struggling to connect with his two grown daughters in Sentimental Value. As the father of eight, the Swedish actor says he understands the tension his character faces.

(Image credit: Chris Pizzello)
item.dc:creator: Dave Davies

item.title: Flavor Flav is among women's hockey team fans outraged by presidential snub
item.description: The rapper, who also serves as the official "hype man" for multiple U.S. Olympic teams, invited the female hockey players to Las Vegas for a "real celebration."
item.content:encoded:
The rapper, who also serves as the official "hype man" for multiple U.S. Olympic teams, invited the female hockey players to Las Vegas for a "real celebration."

(Image credit: Andrew Milligan)
item.dc:creator: Neda Ulaby

item.title: The Louvre Museum's director has resigned in the wake of October's brazen jewel heist
item.description: French President Emmanuel Macron accepted Laurence des Cars' resignation as "an act of responsibility" at a moment when the Louvre needs security upgrades, modernization and other major projects.
item.content:encoded:
French President Emmanuel Macron accepted Laurence des Cars' resignation as "an act of responsibility" at a moment when the Louvre needs security upgrades, modernization and other major projects.

(Image credit: Emma Da Silva)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: TV critic David Bianculli offers a speed-date style rundown of what to watch
item.description: From The Pitt to A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms, Bianculli recommends the best television has to offer right now.
item.content:encoded: From The Pitt to A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms, Bianculli recommends the best television has to offer right now.
item.dc:creator: David Bianculli

item.title: Years ago, novelist Tayari Jones snuck into a writing class. It changed her life
item.description: Jones' new novel, Kin, is set in 1950s Louisiana and Atlanta, and tells the story of two young women who grow up next door to each other without their mothers.
item.content:encoded:
Kin, follows two women growing up without their mothers in the 1950s.'/>

Jones' new novel, Kin, is set in 1950s Louisiana and Atlanta, and tells the story of two young women who grow up next door to each other without their mothers.

(Image credit: Julie Yarbrough)
item.dc:creator: Tonya Mosley
